title: Elfquest The Hidden Years
description: A quintet of lavishly illustrated short stories that fills the gaps in the long history of the Wolfrider elves. Share the ill-omened birth of Skywise the Stargazer. Feel the heat of the tempest as the grown-up chief's daughter Ember strives for her own freedom. Experience the joys and sorrows of a mortal human cub growing up among the Wolfriders... and more
author: Wendy Pini
